Title: Submit with all valid inputs
Test Steps: 1. Enter valid email2. Enter valid name3. Enter message <500 chars4. Click Submit
Expected Result: Form submitted successfully; success message shown

Title: Email field empty
Test Steps: Leave Email blank, fill name & message, click Submit
Expected Result: Error “Email is required” appears; form not submitted

Title: Invalid email format
Test Steps: Enter invalid email, fill name & message, click Submit
Expected Result: Error “Enter valid email” appears; form not submitted

Title: Contact name empty
Test Steps: Leave Name blank, fill email & message, click Submit

Title: Message empty
Test Steps: Leave Message blank, fill email & name, click Submit

Title: Message length = 500 chars
Test Steps: Enter 500-char message, valid email & name, click Submit

Title: Message > 500 chars
Test Steps: Enter 501-char message, valid email & name, click Submit

Title: Email with subdomain
Test Steps: Enter email with subdomain, fill other fields, click Submit

Title: Leading/trailing spaces in fields
Test Steps: Enter email/name/message with extra spaces, click Submit

Title: Special characters in name
Test Steps: Enter name with hyphen/apostrophe, click Submit
